thread.title: ESPN's Stephen A. Smith loses his mind after Lakers name Magic Johnson president
thread.title_full: ESPN's Stephen A. Smith loses his mind after Lakers name Magic Johnson president

author: Sara Harris (sharris@sportingnews.com)
title: ESPN's Stephen A. Smith loses his mind after Lakers name Magic Johnson president
text:
February 22, 2017 10:42am EST February 22, 2017 10:42am EST Stephen A. Smith couldn't contain his excitement after learning the Lakers named Magic Johnson president of basketball operations. (Getty Images) 
Updated at 10:42 a.m. ET 
Updated at 10:42 a.m. ET 
Stephen A. Smith is friends with Magic Johnson, so it would make sense that he would be happy to learn the Lakers named him president of basketball operations. 
We just didn't know he'd be THIS happy. 
Listen to his over-the-top reaction after hearing the news during a commercial break on his radio show Tuesday: . @stephenasmith reacts to news of Magicâ€™s promotion to #Lakers President of Basketball Operations.
